annotations.description: Azure base infrastructure for OpenShift standard architecture

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the resource group

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag indicating that the resource group should be created

variables.name: sync
variables.description: Value used to order the provisioning of the resource group

variables.name: region
variables.description: The Azure location where the resource group will be provisioned

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: The name of the resource group

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: The id of the resource group

outputs.name: group
outputs.description: The resource group object

outputs.name: provision
outputs.description: Flag indicating whether the resource group was provisioned

outputs.name: sync
outputs.description: Value used to order the provisioning of the resource group

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the IBM Cloud resource group where the VPC instance will be created.

variables.name: region
variables.description: The IBM Cloud region where the cluster will be/has been installed.

variables.name: name
variables.description: The name of the vpc instance

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: The name of the vpc resource

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag indicating that the instance should be provisioned. If false then an existing instance will be looked up

variables.name: address_prefix_count
variables.description: The number of ipv4_cidr_blocks

variables.name: address_prefixes
variables.description: List of ipv4 cidr blocks for the address prefixes (e.g. ['10.10.10.0/24']). If you are providing cidr blocks then a value must be provided for each of the subnets. If you don't provide cidr blocks for each of the subnets then values will be generated using the {ipv4_address_count} value.

variables.name: base_security_group_name
variables.description: The name of the base security group. If not provided the name will be based on the vpc name

variables.name: internal_cidr
variables.description: The cidr range of the internal network

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: The name of the VNet instance

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: The id of the VNet instance

outputs.name: crn
outputs.description: The CRN for the VNet instance

outputs.name: count
outputs.description: The number of VPCs created by this module. Always set to 1

outputs.name: names
outputs.description: The name of the vpc instance

outputs.name: ids
outputs.description: The id of the vnet instance

outputs.name: addresses
outputs.description: The ip address ranges for the VNet

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the Azure resource group where the VPC has been provisioned.

variables.name: region
variables.description: The IBM Cloud region where the cluster will be/has been installed.

variables.name: vpc_name
variables.description: The name of the vpc instance

variables.name: subnet_name
variables.description: The name of the subnet instance

variables.name: label
variables.description: Label for the subnets created

variables.name: _count
variables.description: The number of subnets that should be provisioned

variables.name: ipv4_cidr_blocks
variables.description: List of ipv4 cidr blocks for the subnets that will be created (e.g. ['10.10.10.0/24']). If you are providing cidr blocks then a value must be provided for each of the subnets. If you don't provide cidr blocks for each of the subnets then values will be generated using the {ipv4_address_count} value.

variables.name: provision
variables.description: Flag indicating that the NSG should be provisioned.

variables.name: acl_rules
variables.description: List of rules to set on the subnet access control list

variables.name: service_endpoints
variables.description: The list of service endpoints for the subnet

variables.name: disable_private_link_endpoint_network_policies
variables.description: Flag to disable private link endpoint network policies in the subnet.

outputs.name: count
outputs.description: The number of subnets created

outputs.name: ids
outputs.description: The ids of the created subnets

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: The ids of the created subnets

outputs.name: names
outputs.description: The ids of the created subnets

outputs.name: subnets
outputs.description: The subnets that were created

outputs.name: acl_id
outputs.description: The id of the network security group for the subnets

outputs.name: vpc_name
outputs.description: The name of the VPC where the subnets were provisioned

outputs.name: vpc_id
outputs.description: The id of the VPC where the subnets were provisioned

outputs.name: cidr_blocks
outputs.description: The cidr block(s) assigned to the subnets

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the Azure resource group where the VPC has been provisioned

variables.name: region
variables.description: The Azure location where the load balancer will be installed

variables.name: public
variables.description: Flag to indicate whether a public IP is required

variables.name: create_fqdn
variables.description: Create a FQDN from the name prefix as a subddomain of Azure (<name_prefix>.<region>.cloudapp.azure.com)

variables.name: use_ipv4
variables.description: Support IPv4

variables.name: use_ipv6
variables.description: Support IPv6

variables.name: outbound_rule
variables.description: Flag to indicate whether an outbound rule is required for a public load balancer

variables.name: outbound_protocol
variables.description: Protocol for the outbound rule for a public load balancer

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: Prefix for the name of the load balancer to be created

variables.name: subnet_id
variables.description: The subnet id to attach the load balancer frontend if private

variables.name: subnet_cidr_v6
variables.description: Subnet CIDR from which to allocate a public IPv6 address

variables.name: lb_sku
variables.description: Azure Load Balancer SKU type - Basic, Standard or Gateway

variables.name: private_ip_allocation
variables.description: Private IP address allocation method - Static or Dynamic

variables.name: public_ip_allocation
variables.description: Public IP address allocation method - Static or Dynamic

variables.name: dns_label
variables.description: DNS label for public IP

variables.name: public_ip_sku
variables.description: Public IP SKU - Basic or Standard

variables.name: public_ip_name_v4
variables.description: Public IP V4 Name

variables.name: public_ip_name_v6
variables.description: Public IP V6 Name

variables.name: lb_rules
variables.type:
list(object({
        name=string,
        protocol=string,
        probe_name=string,
        frontend_port=number,
        backend_port=number,
        load_distribution=string,
        idle_timeout=number,
        enable_floating_point=bool
    }))
variables.description: List of the load balancer rules to be created

variables.name: lb_probes
variables.type:
list(object({
        name=string,
        interval=number,
        no_probes=number,
        port=number,
        request_path=string,
        protocol=string
    }))
variables.description: List of probes to be created

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: Name of the load balancer created

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: Created load balancer identification

outputs.name: internal_ip_address_v4
outputs.description: Internal IP (IPv4) of the created load balancer (only for non-public load balancer)

outputs.name: internal_ip_address_v6
outputs.description: Internal IP (IPv6) of the created load balancer (only for non-public load balancer)

outputs.name: resource_group_name
outputs.description: Resource group load balancer was created in

outputs.name: region
outputs.description: Region where load balancer was created

outputs.name: platform
outputs.description: Platform for load balancer

outputs.name: backend_address_id_v4
outputs.description: Id of the backend IPv4 address pool created

outputs.name: backend_address_id_v6
outputs.description: Id of the backend IPv6 address pool created

outputs.name: public_ip_address_v4
outputs.description: Public IP (IPv4) allocated to the load balancer

outputs.name: public_ip_address_v6
outputs.description: Public IP (IPv6) allocated to the load balancer

outputs.name: public_fqdn_v4
outputs.description: FQDN allocated to IPv4 public IP address

outputs.name: public_fqdn_v6
outputs.description: FQDN allocated to IPv6 public IP address

outputs.name: backend_pool_id_v4
outputs.description: Backend pool ID for IPv4

outputs.name: backend_pool_id_v6
outputs.description: Backend pool ID for IPv6

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the Azure resource group where the bastion host has been provisioned

variables.name: region
variables.description: The Azure location where the bastion host will be installed

variables.name: virtual_network_name
variables.description: The Azure virtual network name

variables.name: subnet_id
variables.description: The Azure subnet id

variables.name: ip_configuration_name
variables.description: The Azure ip configuration name which is used in vm bastion host

variables.name: bastion_host_name
variables.description: This is the name of Azure bastion host name

variables.name: public_ip_name
variables.description: A Public IP Address name which should be associated with the bastion host resource.

variables.name: public_ip_allocation_method
variables.description: Public IP address allocation method - Static or Dynamic

variables.name: public_ip_sku
variables.description: The SKU which should be used. At this time the only supported value is Standard. Defaults to Standard.

variables.name: public_ip_zones
variables.description: Specifies a list of public ip zones in which this bastion host should be located.

variables.name: subnet_name
variables.description: The bastion host subnet name

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the Azure resource group where the bastion host has been provisioned

variables.name: region
variables.description: The Azure location where the bastion host will be installed

variables.name: virtual_network_name
variables.description: The Azure virtual network name

variables.name: subnet_id
variables.description: The Azure subnet id

variables.name: ip_configuration_name
variables.description: The Azure ip configuration name which is used in vm bastion host

variables.name: bastion_host_name
variables.description: This is the name of Azure bastion host name

variables.name: public_ip_name
variables.description: A Public IP Address name which should be associated with the bastion host resource.

variables.name: public_ip_allocation_method
variables.description: Public IP address allocation method - Static or Dynamic

variables.name: public_ip_sku
variables.description: The SKU which should be used. At this time the only supported value is Standard. Defaults to Standard.

variables.name: public_ip_zones
variables.description: Specifies a list of public ip zones in which this bastion host should be located.

variables.name: subnet_name
variables.description: The bastion host subnet name

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: Name of the Azure resource group where the VPN Gateway has been provisioned.

variables.name: region
variables.description: Location/region to keep all your network resources

variables.name: virtual_network_name
variables.description: Name of the virtual network

variables.name: subnet_name
variables.description: It is mandatory that the associated subnet is named GatewaySubnet

variables.name: subnet_id
variables.description: The Azure subnet id

variables.name: public_ip_name
variables.description: It provide the Public IP for the VPN Gateway

variables.name: public_ip_allocation_method
variables.description: Defines the allocation method for this IP address. Possible values are Static or Dynamic. Defaults is Dynamic

variables.name: vpn_gateway_name
variables.description: Name of the Virtual Network Gateway

variables.name: gateway_type
variables.description: The type of the Virtual Network Gateway. Options are Vpn or ExpressRoute

variables.name: vpn_type
variables.description: The routing type of the Virtual Network Gateway. Options are RouteBased or PolicyBased. Defaults is RouteBased

variables.name: enable_active_active
variables.description: An active-active Virtual Network Gateway will be created, if - true. And it requires a HighPerformance or an UltraPerformance sku. An active-standby gateway will be created, if - false. Defaults to false.

variables.name: enable_bgp
variables.description: BGP (Border Gateway Protocol) will be enabled if - True for this Virtual Network Gateway. Defaults to false

variables.name: vpn_gw_sku
variables.description: Size and capacity of the virtual network gateway. Options are Basic, VpnGw1, VpnGw2

variables.name: vpn_ip_configuration_name
variables.description: Virtual network gateway IP Configuration name details

variables.name: private_ip_address_allocation_method
variables.description: Defines the allocation method for this IP address. Values are Static or Dynamic. Defaults is Dynamic

outputs.name: vpn_gateway_name
outputs.description: Name of the Azure VPN Gateway created

outputs.name: vpn_gateway_public_ip
outputs.description: The Public IP of the Virtual Network Gateway.

variables.name: key_name
variables.description: Name to give to SSH key

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: value

variables.name: region
variables.description: Location to store key

variables.name: store_path
variables.description: Path to directory in which to store keys (will default to current working directory)

variables.name: file_permissions
variables.description: Permissions to be set on created files (default = 0600)

variables.name: store_key_in_vault
variables.description: Flag to storage the generated or supplied key in the Azure vault

variables.name: ssh_key
variables.description: Path to existing public key to be used. Will be created if empty. (Default empty string)

variables.name: algorithm
variables.description: Algorithim to be utilized if creating a new key (RSA, ECDSA or ED25519, default = RSA)

variables.name: rsa_bits
variables.description: Number of bits to use for RSA key (default = 4096)

variables.name: ecdsa_curve
variables.description: ECDSA Curve value to be utilized for ECDSA key (P224, P256, P521, default = P224)

variables.name: tags
variables.description: Extra tags to be added to the Azure Vault entry (default = none)

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: Azure vault identification of the stored key

outputs.name: pub_key
outputs.description: Public key

outputs.name: pub_key_file
outputs.description: File location of public key

outputs.name: path
outputs.description: Path to where keys are stored in filesystem

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: The name of the Azure resource group where the VPC has been provisioned

variables.name: region
variables.description: The Azure location where the load balancer will be installed

variables.name: storage_account_name
variables.description: The name of the Azure Storage Account

variables.name: storage_account_tier
variables.description: The Tier of the Azure Storage Account

variables.name: replication_type
variables.description: The type of the Replication for Azure Storage Account

variables.name: container_name
variables.description: The name of the Azure Blob Storage Container

variables.name: container_access_type
variables.description: The type of access for Azure Storage Container

variables.name: blob_file_name
variables.description: The name of the Blob File

variables.name: blob_file_type
variables.description: The type of Blob for File

variables.name: blob_file_sourcefile_name
variables.description: The name of the Source file

outputs.name: storage_blob_id
outputs.description: The id of the Azure Storage Blob File

outputs.name: storage_blob_url
outputs.description: The URL of the Azure Storage Blob File

variables.name: name_prefix
variables.description: OpenShift Cluster Prefix

variables.name: domain_resource_group_name
variables.description: Resource group name containing the base domain name

variables.name: base_domain
variables.description: Base domain name (e.g. myclusters.mydomain.com)

variables.name: region
variables.description: Azure region into which to deploy

variables.name: subscription_id
variables.description: Subscription into which to deploy OpenShift and containing the existing resource group

variables.name: client_id
variables.description: The client id (service principal appID) to be used for OpenShift

variables.name: client_secret
variables.description: The client secret (e.g. service principal password) to be used for OpenShift

variables.name: tenant_id
variables.description: Tenant id containing the subscription

variables.name: pull_secret
variables.description: Pull secret for OpenShift image repository access and to register the cluster

variables.name: pull_secret_file
variables.description: File with the pull secret for OpenShift image repository access and to register the cluster

variables.name: binary_offset
variables.description: Path offset from current working directory to install binaries (default = binaries)

variables.name: install_offset
variables.description: Path offset from current working directory for install metadata (default = install)

variables.name: openshift_ssh_key
variables.description: The SSH Public Key to use for OpenShift Installation

variables.name: vnet_name
variables.description: VNet name to deploy into if using existing VNet

variables.name: master_subnet_name
variables.description: Name of the master subnet

variables.name: worker_subnet_name
variables.description: Name of the worker subnet

variables.name: openshift_version
variables.description: OpenShift version to install

variables.name: binary_url_base
variables.description: Base URL for OpenShift installer and CLI binaries

variables.name: network_resource_group_name
variables.description: Name of the resource group for the network components (must be different to the overall resource group)

variables.name: master_hyperthreading
variables.description: Enable hyperthreading for master nodes (default = enabled)

variables.name: master_architecture
variables.description: CPU Architecture for the master nodes (default = amd64)

variables.name: master_node_disk_size
variables.description: Size of master node disk in GB (default = 120)

variables.name: master_node_disk_type
variables.description: Type of disk for the master nodes (default = Premium_LRS)

variables.name: master_node_type
variables.description: Master node type (defualt = Standard_D2s_v3)

variables.name: master_node_qty
variables.description: Number of master nodes to create (default = 3)

variables.name: worker_hyperthreading
variables.description: Enable hyperthreading for compute/worker nodes (default = enabled)

variables.name: worker_architecture
variables.description: CPU Architecture for the worker nodes (default = amd64)

variables.name: worker_node_type
variables.description: Compute/worker node type (default = Standard_D2s_v3)

variables.name: worker_node_disk_size
variables.description: Compute/worker node disk size in GB (default = 120)

variables.name: worker_node_disk_type
variables.description: Type of disk for the worker nodes (default = Premium_LRS)

variables.name: worker_node_qty
variables.description: Number of compute/worker nodes to create (default = 3)

variables.name: cluster_cidr
variables.description: CIDR for the internal OpenShift network (default = 10.128.0.0/14)

variables.name: cluster_host_prefix
variables.description: Host prefix for internal OpenShift network (default = 23)

variables.name: machine_cidr
variables.description: CIDR for master and compute nodes (default = 10.0.0.0/16)

variables.name: network_type
variables.description: Network plugin to use (default = OpenShiftSDN)

variables.name: service_network_cidr
variables.description: CIDR for the internal OpenShift service network (default = 172.30.0.0/16)

variables.name: outbound_type
variables.description: The type of outbound routing to use. Loadbalancer (default) or UserDefinedRouting

variables.name: enable_fips
variables.description: Enable FIPS in the cluster (default = false)

outputs.name: id
outputs.description: ID of the created cluster

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: Name of the cluster

outputs.name: resource_group_name
outputs.description: Name of the resource group containing the cluster

outputs.name: region
outputs.description: Azure location containing the cluster

outputs.name: config_file_path
outputs.description: Path to the config file for the cluster

outputs.name: consoleURL
outputs.description: URL for the cluster console

outputs.name: server_url
outputs.description: The url used to connect to the api of the cluster

outputs.name: username
outputs.description: Username for the cluster

outputs.name: password
outputs.description: Password for the cluster

outputs.name: token
outputs.description: The admin user token used to generate the cluster

outputs.name: bin_dir
outputs.description: Path to the client binaries

outputs.name: platform
outputs.description: Configuration values for the created cluster platform
